author: davidt99
body:
## Steps to reproduce

``` powershell
> Install-Module AzureRM
```
## Expected behavior

AzureRM module will be installed correctly
## Actual behavior

After I agree to trust PSGalley repository, the module starts to install.
After few seconds I'm getting an error:

``` powershell
PackageManagement\Install-Package : Package 'AzureRM.profile' failed to be installed because: /tmp/652699238/AzureRM.profile/AzureRM.profile.nuspec
At /opt/microsoft/powershell/6.0.0-alpha.9/Modules/PowerShellGet/PSModule.psm1:1706 char:21
+ ...          $null = PackageManagement\Install-Package @PSBoundParameters
+                      ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ CategoryInfo          : InvalidResult: (AzureRM.profile:String) [Install-Package], Exception
+ FullyQualifiedErrorId : Package '{0}' failed to be installed because: {1},Microsoft.PowerShell.PackageManagement.Cmdlets.InstallPackage
```
## Environment data

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value                                                                                                                                                                                                  
----                           -----                                                                                                                                                                                                  
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha                                                                                                                                                                                            
PSEdition                      Core                                                                                                                                                                                                   
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                                                                                                                                
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0                                                                                                                                                                                                
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.9                                                                                                                                                                                         
CLRVersion                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                                                                                                                                                                                    
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                                                                                                                                    
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1  
```

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body: You need to specify the AzureRM.NetCore.Preview as the AzureRM module requires the Full .NET Framework and is currently being refactored to work for .NET Core

comments.author: davidt99
comments.body:
Tried it and I'm getting another error:

``` powershell
PackageManagement\Install-Package : Could not compare "6.0.0-alpha" to "5.0".
Error: "Cannot convert value "5.0" to type "System.Management.Automation.SemanticVersion".
Error: "Cannot process argument because the value of argument "version" is not valid. Change the value of the "version" argument and run the operation again.""
At /opt/microsoft/powershell/6.0.0-alpha.9/Modules/PowerShellGet/PSModule.psm1:1706 char:21
```

comments.author: davidt99
comments.body:
It works, thanks!
Just a heads-up, installing in `/opt/microsoft/powershell/6.0.0-alpha.9/Modules/` requires root privileges.

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Appears resolved, closing. Please let me know if this needs to reopened.

Solution here:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/1874
from StephenGilboy:
 followed @alexandair's advice and it worked. A step by step though is that you'll need to do the following. (I also put the modules in my home directory, not sure if that is correct)

    Install-Package -Name AzureRM.NetCore.Preview -Source https://www.powershellgallery.com/api/v2/ -ProviderName NuGet -ExcludeVersion -Destination $home/powershell/modules
    Import-Module $home/powershell/modules/AzureRM.Profile.NetCore.Preview
    Import-Module $home/powershell/modules/AzureRM.Resources.NetCore.Preview
    Import-Module $home/powershell/modules/AzureRM.NetCore.Preview
    Login-AzureRmAccount

Note: When I ran the command Get-Module -ListAvailable AzureRM was not in the list and it seems that when you exit Powershell the AzureRM module goes away. Also, before I started I upgraded dotnet to version 1.0.0-preview3-003246
